text:
Ah, these cigarettes!

Porfiry lights a cigarette, coughing.  
Porfiry: “They’re pernicious, yet I can’t quit!”  

Raskolnikov watches, disgusted.  
Raskolnikov (thought): “He’s playing his tricks again.”  

---  

Porfiry leans back, casual.  
Porfiry: “I visited two days ago, you know?”  

Raskolnikov's expression darkens.  
Raskolnikov (thought): “Why didn’t I lock the door?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Porfiry Petrovitch expresses his struggle with quitting smoking while visiting Raskolnikov, who feels increasingly uneasy during the conversation.
